gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 118, Nets 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers win their eighth straight game as they defeat the Nets, 118-95. Donovan Mitchell notched 27 points, five rebounds and four assists for the Cavaliers, while Jarrett Allen added 14 points, 10 rebounds and two blocks in the victory. Mikal Bridges tallied 26 points (5-13 3pt. FG) and five assists for the Nets in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 34-16 on the season, while the Nets fall to 20-31.
